mapper.insert: INSERT INTO driver_school_students ( user_name, mobile_phone, id_card, status, add_user_id, add_user, add_time, mod_user_id, mod_user, mod_time, delete_flag ) VALUES ( #{po.userName}, #{po.mobilePhone}, #{po.idCard}, #{po.status}, #{po.addUserId}, #{po.addUser}, #{po.addTime}, #{po.modUserId}, #{po.modUser}, #{po.modTime}, #{po.deleteFlag} );
